title: Mary Maxim Natural Alpaca Tweed Yarn - 4 Medium Worsted Weight Yarn for Knit & Crochet Projects - 77% Acrylic, 20% Alpaca, 3% Viscose - 4 Ply - 262 Yards (Thistle)
features: ✔️ SUPER LUX YARN BLEND: Soft, ultra-warm and yet lightweight, each ball also comes with complementary flecks of color through each ball. Natural Alpaca is perfect blend for any type of project such as sweaters, afghans, hats, scarfs and much more.

✔️ KNIT & CROCHET FRIENDLY: So easy to work with, Alpaca Tweed Worsted Weight Yarn runs at 3.5oz (100 g) with 262 yards (239.572 m) and Gauge of 18 sts. &24 rows to 4" (10 cm). It is best used with a Knitting Needle Size 8 (5 mm).
✔️ MOST VERSITILE YARN EVER: In the crafting world, Size 4 Worsted Weight Yarn is known as the “all-purpose yarn” to make handmade sweaters, hats, afghan blankets, baby clothes, winter gear & more!

✔️ FREE PROJECT IDEAS: Have extra yarn left over? Need inspiration for a cool knitting or crochet project? Mary Maxim customers have 24/7 access to design ideas and patterns - for free - on our website!
✔️ 100% RISK FREE PURCHASE: Change your mind on the color? Looking for yarn of a different texture? No problem. Return or exchange your unspooled yarn within 30 days- no questions asked.
